sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YETA3180 ( DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , CTRB_SEQN , CTRB_DDCD , CTRB_TYCD , CTRB_CONT , CTRB_YRMN , CTRB_NAME , CTRB_BSNU , CTRB_AMNT , CRTB_CNCD , CRNR_FLAG , CBTG_NAME , RSNO_NUMB , CTRB_CTNT , RECE_RATI , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# , #systemkey# , #ctrbSeqn# , #ctrbDdcd# , #ctrbTycd# , #ctrbCont# , #ctrbYrmn# , #ctrbName# , #ctrbBsnu# , #ctrbAmnt# , #crtbCncd# , #crnrFlag# , #cbtgName# , #rsnoNumb# , #ctrbCtnt# , #receRati# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )

INSERT INTO YETA3180 ( DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , CTRB_SEQN , CTRB_DDCD , CTRB_TYCD , CTRB_CONT , CTRB_YRMN , CTRB_NAME , CTRB_BSNU , CTRB_AMNT , CRTB_CNCD , CRNR_FLAG , CBTG_NAME , RSNO_NUMB , CTRB_CTNT , RECE_RATI , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# , #systemkey# , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(CTRB_SEQN),0) + 1 FROM YETA3180 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY = #edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD = #settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# ) , #ctrbDdcd# , #ctrbTycd# , #ctrbCont# , #ctrbYrmn# , #ctrbName# , #ctrbBsnu# , #ctrbAmnt# , ( NVL((SELECT RELH_CODE FROM YETA3220 WHERE YETA3220.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND YETA3220.EDAC_RVYY = #edacRvyy# AND YETA3220.SETT_GBCD = #settGbcd# AND YETA3220.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND RSNO_NUMB = #crtbCncd# ),'A0190001') ) , ( NVL((SELECT FRNR_CODE FROM YETA3220 WHERE YETA3220.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND YETA3220.EDAC_RVYY = #edacRvyy# AND YETA3220.SETT_GBCD = #settGbcd# AND YETA3220.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND RSNO_NUMB = #crnrFlag# ),'1') ) , #cbtgName# , #rsnoNumb# , #ctrbCtnt# , #receRati# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YETA3180 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# , SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , CTRB_SEQN=#ctrbSeqn# , CTRB_DDCD=#ctrbDdcd# , CTRB_TYCD=#ctrbTycd# , CTRB_CONT=#ctrbCont# , CTRB_YRMN=#ctrbYrmn# , CTRB_NAME=#ctrbName# , CTRB_BSNU=#ctrbBsnu# , CTRB_AMNT=#ctrbAmnt# , CRTB_CNCD=#crtbCncd# , CRNR_FLAG=#crnrFlag# , CBTG_NAME=#cbtgName# , RSNO_NUMB=#rsnoNumb# , CTRB_CTNT=#ctrbCtnt# , RECE_RATI=#receRati# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CTRB_SEQN=#ctrbSeqn#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YETA3180 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CTRB_SEQN=#ctrbSeqn#

DELETE FROM YETA3180 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , CTRB_SEQN , CTRB_DDCD , CTRB_TYCD , CTRB_CONT , CTRB_YRMN , CTRB_NAME , CTRB_BSNU , CTRB_AMNT , CRTB_CNCD , CRNR_FLAG , CBTG_NAME , RSNO_NUMB , CTRB_CTNT , RECE_RATI , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3180 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CTRB_SEQN=#ctrbSeqn#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , CTRB_SEQN , CTRB_DDCD , CTRB_TYCD , CTRB_CONT , CTRB_YRMN , CTRB_NAME , CTRB_BSNU , CTRB_AMNT , CRTB_CNCD , CRNR_FLAG , CBTG_NAME , RSNO_NUMB , CTRB_CTNT , RECE_RATI , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3180 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , CTRB_SEQN DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3180 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
